name: pd-and-web-server
description: Intended to be runned in an android (termux) phone in thetering mode it serves a webpage and it unpacks the webpage's http request and re-sends it to [netsend~] and [netreceives~] at a 127.0.0.1 pure data application running at the same phone (http://droidparty.net/)
author: Lau Llobet
